label: 自在
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: Refers to the unlimited power of buddhas and bodhisattvas to do what they wish:  e.g. to see everywhere, to be born anywhere, to extend or shorten life, to save sentient beings (p. 623n).
